title: How Did Valve Secretly Make An HDR SteamDeck!?!
description:
I've been keeping a close eye on the development of HDR on Linux and somehow I didn't suspect at the creation of an HDR version of the SteamDeck with the Steam Deck OLED and today I wanted to do a recap on a lot of that work.
